select /*+index_desc(k liq_like_pk)*/ l.liq_id, l.nm,l.prc,l.cate,l.capct,l.lv, l.irdnt,l.img, k.liq_like_id, m.member_id,m.name,m.img profile from liq l,liq_like k, member m where l.liq_id = k.liq_id and k.member_id=#{memberId} and k.member_id = m.member_id
